funding-group.funding-statement: FJ is funded by Santé publique France ( www.santepubliquefrance.fr) through a doctoral fellowship. Meteorological data were provided by Météo-France, the national meteorological agency, within the framework of the agreement linking the agency with Santé Publique France. Access to satellite images used in this work was supported by public funds received under the framework of GEOSUD, a project (ANR-10-EQPX-20) with the "Investissements d'Avenir" program, managed by the French National Research Agency. Funders do not play any role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
